medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient with a history of CVA, dementia, hypertension, and diabetes complicated by neuropathy presented with vomiting and jaundice. Lipase levels were elevated, and total bilirubin was found to be high upon examination. The symptoms and lab values indicated ongoing issues.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus complicated by neuropathy, hypertension, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), arthritis, history of right cerebrovascular accident (CVA).
